subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Spain beat Brazil in a battle of unbeaten teams to take the lead in Group A at the Basketball World Cup. Pau Gasol had 26 points and 9 rebounds in the 82-63 victory in Granada.
snippet: Spain beat Brazil in a battle of unbeaten teams to take the lead in Group A at the Basketball World Cup. Pau Gasol had 26 points and 9 rebounds in the 82-63 victory in Granada.
